Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update: Inline video embed on home page, reorder guides sections

- Home page shows YouTube embed inline \(no modal click needed\)
- Guides page: article guides first, then video guides
- Replaced placeholder Drive videos with real YouTube content

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

EOF
\)")

EOF
\)")
